name: GirlBoss-Arcadia
description:
Welcome to our Halloween 2021 RIT Game Jam entry for the Halloween 2021 RIT Game Jam. In honor of the theme, "sacrifice," me (Dancetrap), wonder8, EmZViolia, and Byankin' have created an arcade-style platform where you must sacrifice your lives in order to progress

Controls

Move: Left and Right Arrow Keys

Jump: N, C, Z

Sacrifice Heart: X, V, M

Jump on enemies heads to kill them

Use hearts to open doors and chests

Credits:

(Artwork by wonder8 and Dancetrap)

(GirlBoss design by wonder8)

(Enemy designs by Dancetrap)

(Coding by EmZViolia and Byankin')

(Music by ROBO remastered by wonder8)
